channel.title: Comments on: MySQL Cluster 7.1 is GA
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: rwhit
item.dc:creator: rwhit
item.description: I notice on the downloads page Windows is listed as GA platform. Is the intent to support production deployment of 7.1 on windows?
item.content:encoded: I notice on the downloads page Windows is listed as GA platform. Is the intent to support production deployment of 7.1 on windows?
